mapper.sql: ROLE_CODE, ROLE_NAME, ROLE_TYPE, PARENT_ID, ROLE_PATH, ROLE_ORDER, IS_ROLE_ASSIGNABLE, IS_ROLE_DELETE, ROLE_DESCRIBE, ROLE_CLASSIFY, ROLE_CLASSES, GMT_CREATED, GMT_MODIFIED, CREATOR, OPERATOR, STATUS, ROLE_STATUS, CANCEL_DATE, ENABLE_OPERATOR, DISABLE_OPERATOR, ENABLE_LAST_DATE, DISABLE_LAST_DATE
mapper.insert:
insert into
ROLE_CODE,
ROLE_NAME,
ROLE_TYPE,
PARENT_ID,
ROLE_PATH,
ROLE_ORDER,
IS_ROLE_ASSIGNABLE,
IS_ROLE_DELETE,
ROLE_DESCRIBE,
ROLE_CLASSIFY,
ROLE_CLASSES,
GMT_CREATED,
GMT_MODIFIED,
CREATOR,
OPERATOR,
STATUS,
ROLE_STATUS,
CANCEL_DATE,
ENABLE_OPERATOR,
DISABLE_OPERATOR,
ENABLE_LAST_DATE,
DISABLE_LAST_DATE,
#{roleCode},
#{roleName},
#{roleType},
#{parentId},
#{rolePath},
#{roleOrder},
#{isRoleAssignable},
#{isRoleDelete},
#{roleDescribe},
#{roleClassify},
#{roleClasses},
#{gmtCreated},
#{gmtModified},
#{creator},
#{operator},
#{status},
#{roleStatus},
#{cancelDate},
#{enableOperator},
#{disableOperator},
#{enableLastDate},
#{disableLastDate},
mapper.update:
update
ROLE_CODE=#{roleCode},
ROLE_NAME=#{roleName},
ROLE_TYPE=#{roleType},
PARENT_ID=#{parentId},
ROLE_PATH=#{rolePath},
ROLE_ORDER=#{roleOrder},
IS_ROLE_ASSIGNABLE=#{isRoleAssignable},
IS_ROLE_DELETE=#{isRoleDelete},
ROLE_DESCRIBE=#{roleDescribe},
ROLE_CLASSIFY=#{roleClassify},
ROLE_CLASSES=#{roleClasses},
GMT_CREATED=#{gmtCreated},
GMT_MODIFIED=#{gmtModified},
CREATOR=#{creator},
OPERATOR=#{operator},
STATUS=#{status},
ROLE_STATUS=#{roleStatus},
CANCEL_DATE=#{cancelDate},
ENABLE_OPERATOR=#{enableOperator},
DISABLE_OPERATOR=#{disableOperator},
ENABLE_LAST_DATE=#{enableLastDate},
DISABLE_LAST_DATE=#{disableLastDate},
where ROLE_CODE=#{roleCode}
